title: Idol wo Mamoru dake no Kantan na Oshigoto.
original_name: アイドルを守るだけの簡単なおしごと。
sinopse:
Asuna Tokitomo is the most popular idol in Japan and a leader of an idol unit.

Shoutarou Yamabuki, who is Asuna's fan, accidentally saved her from her stalker...!?

When he realizes what is happening to himself, he is already involved in accident!
